alerts.description: Email notify before case expire 1 day
Notify approver KYC case has been recalled
Notify requester KYC case has been approved
Notify requester KYC case has been rejected
Send Email notify to customer owner
Send email change condition cancel to Zone and Customer Owner

fieldUpdates.formula: if( Issue__c <> '', Issue__c , if( Product_Category__c <> '' , Product_Category__c, Sub_Category__c ))
fieldUpdates.name: Auto Update Case Subject
Stamp All Previous Owner
Update Case Status to In Progress

fieldUpdates.literalValue: ปรับปรุง/แก้ไขรายการให้ลูกค้า

Update Last Change UW Owner Date
Update Record type to Retail Service
Update Record type to SE Call Center
Update Record type to WBG Service
Update Record type to close case(Retail)
Update Record type to closed case
Update Record type to closed case (Oper)
Update Record type to closed case (WBG)
Update UW Changed Owner to CS Date

rules.description: After create case auto update Subject by last level of service type

rules.fullName: Auto email Change Condition_CS Case Cancelled
rules.description: Category = Change Condition_CS, if Case status = Cancelled Auto Email to Last Zone Owner and Customer Owner

rules.fullName: Auto email Change Condition_CS Case UW Approved
rules.description: If Category = Change Condition_CS and UW Action = Approved send email to Zone
rules.formula: if( AND(Category__c = 'Change Condition_CS', TEXT(UW_Action__c) = 'Approved', Last_Zone_Email__c <> '', AND(OR(PRIORVALUE( Owner_Team__c ) = 'UW', PRIORVALUE(Owner_Team__c) = 'UW_SEC1', PRIORVALUE(Owner_Team__c) = 'UW SEC1' ,PRIORVALUE(Owner_Team__c) = 'UW_SEC2', PRIORVALUE(Owner_Team__c) = 'UW SEC2'), IsClosed = False, ISCHANGED(OwnerId))) , true, false)

rules.fullName: Auto email Change Condition_CS Case created
rules.description: ตอน Create case "Category = Change Condition_CS" ให้ Auto Email to Customer Owner

rules.booleanFilter: (1 OR 2 OR 3 or 4 or 5 or 6 or 7 or 8 )AND 9
rules.description: Clear stamp data in old case for Clone record.

rules.fullName: Email Notify Before case expire 1 day
rules.description: Send email notify case owner before case expire 1 day
Send email notify case owner and manager when case expired
When case complaint created send email alert to BRC agent
Closed case when tick FCR
Stamp user that change case status info and date time
Update Previous Owner information and send email to notify new owner
rules.formula: AND(OR(AND(ISNEW(), Owner:User.Id <> CreatedBy.Id ), ISCHANGED( OwnerId )), IsClosed = False, FCR__c = False)

rules.description: Check if owner is a user or a queue
Stamp user that closed case information, Stop SLA, Update record type to Closed
Stamp user that closed case information, Stop SLA, Update record type to Closed
Stamp user that closed case information, Stop SLA, Update record type to Closed
Stamp user that closed case information, Stop SLA, Update record type to Closed
if case has customer workflow will stamp RMID to RM_ID__c field in case
Stamp user that resolved case info

rules.fullName: UW Changed Owner to CS Date
rules.description: Update UW Changed Owner to CS Date
rules.formula: if(AND(OR(PRIORVALUE( Owner_Team__c ) = 'UW', PRIORVALUE(Owner_Team__c) = 'UW_SEC1', PRIORVALUE(Owner_Team__c) = 'UW SEC1' ,PRIORVALUE(Owner_Team__c) = 'UW_SEC2', PRIORVALUE(Owner_Team__c) = 'UW SEC2'), IsClosed = False, ISCHANGED(OwnerId)) , true, false)

rules.description: if CWM Write log flag is true, update back to false

rules.fullName: Update Case Record Type Operation from Clone
rules.description: Update record type to Open case when Clone Case from Closed case. Update flag Clone case

rules.fullName: Update Case Record Type Retail Service from Clone
rules.description: Update record type to Open case when Clone Case from Closed case. Update flag Clone case

rules.fullName: Update Case Record Type WBG Service from Clone
rules.description: Update record type to Open case when Clone Case from Closed case. Update flag Clone case
Update record type to Open case when Clone Case from Closed case. Update flag Clone case

rules.fullName: Update Case Status to In Progress
rules.booleanFilter: 1 AND 2 and ( 3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 OR 18 or 19)
rules.description: If update information in CS Process section will auto update Status to In progress
when assigned to CS user. Stamp assigned, Date Assigned.
rules.formula: if(OR(AND(CONTAINS(Owner:User.Profile.Name, 'Client Support Profile'), IsClosed = False, ISCHANGED(OwnerId) ),AND(CONTAINS(Owner:User.Profile.Name, 'Client Support Profile'), IsClosed = False, ISNEW()) ), true,false)

rules.description: Stamp last UW Owner
rules.formula: if(AND(Owner:User.Profile.Name = 'TMB UW Profile', IsClosed = False, RecordType.Name = 'SE Call Center', ISCHANGED(OwnerId) ), true,false)

rules.description: Update user that action in Zone section to Last Zone Owner , Last Zone Email
Update Card No. to masking 1234********1234
rules.formula: if(Card_No__c <> null , if( OR(ISCHANGED(Card_No__c ), AND(ISNEW())), true, false), false)

rules.description: Update Card No2. to masking 1234********1234
rules.formula: if(Card_No2__c <> null , if( OR(ISCHANGED(Card_No2__c ), AND(ISNEW())), true, false), false)

rules.fullName: Update Resolve by when closed case
rules.description: If closed case and resolve by is null, update resolve by info

criteriaItems.value: 06. Done Approve BU,07. Done Approve UW,08. Done Approve CS,09. Done Reject BU,10. Done Reject UW,11. Done Reject CS

rules.description: When CS Status is 06. Done Approve BU,07. Done Approve UW,08. Done Approve CS,09. Done Reject BU,10. Done Reject UW,11. Done Reject CS , Update field Send to Operation Date
